title: Thomas Betzwieser
text:
Thomas Ludwig Betzwieser (born 23 March 1958 in <a href="Edingen-Neckarhausen">Neckarhausen</a> near <a href="Heidelberg">Heidelberg</a>) is a German <a href="Musicology">musicologist</a> and <a href="opera">opera</a> scholar. He became a member of the <a href="Akademie%20der%20Wissenschaften%20und%20der%20Literatur">Akademie der Wissenschaften und der Literatur</a> in 2015.
Betzwieser is the author of books including:
